name: Tube Fairies
description:
Join a group of 3 youtube gamers and conquer the magical indie land with the help of their fairy wands in this magical virtual adventure.

Shoot magical stars, fly with grace in the air and annihilate the indie threat.

The goal of the game is to get as many points as possible by staying on screen for as long as you can. You can shoot fairy stars at your enemies or fly past them with your graceful fairy wings.

Tube Fairies is an arcade shoot'em up parody game. Featuring renown youtubers and indie game titles, use your wand as a tube fairy to blast through indie games gone crazy!

Originally created for the "Indies vs Gamers" gamejam on Game Jolt, Tube Fairies parodies youtubers Pewdiepie, Markiplier and Jacksepticeye as they are pit against enemies from their favorite indie game titles.
